artifacts.summary: Comprehensive gap analysis comparing nvim .claude/ (post-task-44) against LogosWebsite .claude/ (pre-task-44 copy), documenting 7 high-priority plan status fix gaps, 7 medium-priority missing files, and padding convention differences
Research report comparing LogosWebsite task 9 bug with current state of this repo, identifying 3 remaining consistency gaps
Analysis of <leader>ac sync mechanism failures: stale global source, incomplete file type scanning, unscanned directories, and 5 fix recommendations
5-phase implementation plan covering global_dir centralization, multi-extension context scanning, project-root CLAUDE.md syncing, docs coverage verification, and integration testing
Implementation summary with verification results for all 5 phases

active_projects.completion_summary: Centralized the global source directory path from hardcoded ~/.config to configurable ~/.config/nvim across 8 files with 13+ references replaced. Added multi-extension context scanning (JSON/YAML) and project-root CLAUDE.md syncing to the <leader>ac sync mechanism.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive gap analysis of LogosWebsite web language routing: Phase 1 partially done (6/8), Phases 2-4 not started, 14 additive changes needed across 12 files organized by priority tier
7-phase implementation plan fixing routing table inconsistencies, stale lean references, and missing language entries across .claude/ system
Implementation summary with verification results for all 7 phases

active_projects.completion_summary: Fixed language routing inconsistencies across 16 .claude/ files. All routing tables now consistently use 6 recognized languages (neovim, general, meta, markdown, latex, typst). Replaced stale lean references with neovim, removed non-routing python/shell/json entries, updated skill trigger conditions, and removed obsolete /lake command documentation.

active_projects.completion_summary: Fixed TODO.md artifact links by adding specs/ prefix stripping in 8 skill postflight stages, correcting 4 documentation files, and cleaning up 6 existing links in TODO.md.

artifacts.summary: Comprehensive research report with root cause analysis for leanls LSP errors, NixOS timezone configuration, and lean.nvim infoview buffer handling issues
Supplementary research comparing NixOS /etc/localtime alternatives: tmpfiles.rules (recommended), Home Manager, direnv, makeWrapper, and current cmd_env approach
3-phase plan: optional NixOS tmpfiles.rules, buffer validity guard, and testing

active_projects.completion_summary: Added BufDelete autocmd to close lean.nvim infoview before buffer deletion, preventing 'Invalid buffer id' error. The fix uses pcall for safe closure and integrates with the existing lean_group augroup.

artifacts.summary: Research report analyzing 5 multi-task creation patterns with unified standard recommendations

Multi-task creation standard (8 components, implementation checklist, compliance matrix)

active_projects.completion_summary: Created multi-task creation standard document with 8-component pattern (discovery, selection, grouping, dependencies, ordering, visualization, confirmation, state updates). Updated 7 command/skill/agent files with Standards Reference sections and compliance tables. Added Multi-Task Creation Standards section to CLAUDE.md.
